General.Name: Gourmet Master Co Ltd
General.Description: Gourmet Master Co. Ltd., an investment holding company, operates and franchises a chain of cafes in China, Taiwan, the United States, and internationally. The company operates its cafes under the 85°C name, which includes beverages, pastries, bread, and other products. It also engages in wholesale and manufacturing of bakery foods, beverages, and other mechanical appliances. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
